info.title: API Banking - Notifications and Subscriptions
info.description:
**API Banking - Notifications and Subscriptions**

Provides real-time push of events (callbacks) to client's API/WebHook. Notifications APIs provide real-time push notification of events through our guaranteed WebHook delivery mechanism. Through these APIs, client can receive credit/debit notifications, transactions and custody transactions statuses.

tags.name: Notification
tags.description: Provides real-time push of events (callbacks) to client's API/WebHook. Notifications APIs provide real-time push notification of events through our guaranteed WebHook delivery mechanism. Through these APIs, client can receive credit/debit notifications, transactions and custody transactions statuses.

post.description:
The Market News Updates API provides the ability to receive real-time notification of market news events.
Note: To avoid any impact to your system, it is recommended not to perform any length validation nor strict schema validation for the notification messages as they are subject to changes.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

post.description:
The Credit/Debit Advice Updates API provides the ability to receive real-time notification of credits or debits into accounts.

Note: To avoid any impact to your system, it is recommended not to perform any length validation nor strict schema validation for the notification messages as they are subject to changes.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

post.description:
The Transaction Advice API provides the ability to receive near real-time notification of credits and debits into accounts with improved reporting of returned payment in SG market (coverage will be expanded).

Note: To avoid any impact to your system, it is recommended not to perform any length validation nor strict schema validation for the notification messages as they are subject to changes.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

post.description:
The Payment Transaction Status Updates API provides the ability to receive real-time notifications of payment transaction status events.

Note: The order of the messages might not be delivered in sequence due to the distributed nature of the application and the impact of internet communications. You need to be aware of such cases and consider implementing suitable measures, such as ignoring the intermediate status of a transaction if it is received after its final status.

To avoid any impact to your system, it is recommended not to perform any length validation nor strict schema validation for the notification messages as they are subject to changes.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

Note: To avoid any impact to your system, it is recommended not to perform any length validation nor strict schema validation for the notification messages as they are subject to changes.

post.description:
The Virtual Account Status Updates API provides the ability to receive real-time notifications of a previously submitted Virtual Account Maintenance (VAM) request through VA APIs.

Note: The order of the messages might not be delivered in sequence due to the distributed nature of the application and the impact of internet communications. You need to be aware of such cases and consider implementing suitable measures, such as ignoring the intermediate status of a transaction if it is received after its final status.

To avoid any impact to your system, it is recommended not to perform any length validation nor strict schema validation for the notification messages as they are subject to changes.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

post.x-markets: HK, SG, MY, IN, PH, BD, AE

post.description:
The Account Details Validation (NPCI) Status Updates API provides the ability to receive real-time notifcations on the status of the NPCI Account Details Validation (Account Holder, Account Status, Account Details).

Note: To avoid any impact to your system, it is recommended not to perform any length validation nor strict schema validation for the notification messages as they are subject to changes.

value.errorDesc: Your request can not be processed now

Account is in open and active state

post.description: The Supplier Finance - Financing Status Updates API provides the ability to receive real-time notifications of supplier financing status updates. The report will contain a list of transactions and if there are more than 100 transactions then it will be split into multiple reports (each report will have a maximum of 100 transactions per message).

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data

429.description: Default return code for health status, indicating a warning

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server

503.description: System dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later

accountId.description: Account Number for which details were requested

accountStatusDesc.description:
Possible values for Account Status.
Status CodeStatus Description
S000Account is in open state
S001Account is in open and active state
S002Account under litigation
S003 A/c inactive (No Transactions for last 3 Months)
S004 Dormant A/c (No Transactions for last 6 Months)
S005 Account holder expired
S006 A/c blocked or frozen
S007 Customer insolvent / insane
S008 Account Closed
S009 No such Account
S010 KYC Documents Pending
S011 Invalid IFSC code
S012 Network failure (CBS)
S013 A/c in Zero balance/No transactions have happened
S999Others
accountStatusDesc.example: Account is in open and active state

accountTypeDesc.description:
Possible values for Account Types.
Account Type CodeAccount Type Description
T001Savings Account
T002Current Account
T003 Cash credit Account
T004 Overdraft Account
T006 FD
T007 RD
T008 Loan Account
T009 PMJDY Account
T010 NRE/NRO account
T011 HUF - Hindu Undivided family
T012 PF & PPF
T013 Basic Savings Bank Deposit (BSBD)
T999Others

errorDesc.description:
Error Codes Description.
Error CodeError Description
AER-101Your request can not be processed now
AER-105Internal Service is down. Please try after some time
AER-102No such Account
AER-103 Invalid IFSC code
AER-104 Network failure happened in Destination bank side
AER-159 Destination bank sent invalid Account Type
AER-160 Destination bank sent invalid Account Status
AER-170 Destination bank sent invalid Account holder Name
AER-215 Destination bank is not reachable
AER-216 Destination bank send incomplete response
AER-217 Destination bank did not send response with in SLA
AER-220 Destination bank service is not available
AER-221 Destination bank is not active
AER-225 Earlier response given by Destination bank
errorDesc.example: Your request can not be processed now

date.description: Date of the newsflash  in yyyy-MM-dd[THH:MM] format, where [THH:MM] is an optional time of day

headline.example: Partnership Between Bovespa and CME Group - Update

text.description: Text of the flash body, should be an XHTML string
text.example: In an update to our previous newsflash, Bovespa and CME Group (Chicago Mercantile Exchange Group) have obtained the regulatory approval from the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) to allow..

urgent.description: Urgency of the newsflash. 0 for ordinary newsflash, for urgent ones will have the value of 1

groupId.description: The registered group ID of the client.

eventDate.description:
The system date of the the credit/debit advice of the Bank's core banking system.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

valueDate.description:
The value date of the credit/debit transaction.

Format: YYYY-MM-DD

virtualAccountId.description: The virtual account number used for this credit/debit transaction.

items.description: Each item in the array with a current max length of 140. It is recommended not to perform any length validation as this is subject to changes.

transactionExtendedFreeText.description: The extended narration for the transaction.

items.description: Each item in the array with a current max length of 140. It is recommended not to perform any length validation as this is subject to changes.

transactionMultiLingualFreeText.description: The payment details along with the local language narration if applicable.

externalIdentifier.description: (Not in use) The external identifier details.

additionalTransactionDescription.description: The addtional details of the transaction.

supplementaryTransactionDescription.description: The supplementary details of the transaction.

postingMode.description:
The posting mode of the transaction. Only HK, TH and TW markets will return a value, if any. As memo transactions are night mode, the balances generated for the Credit/Debit Advice may deviate from the accurate balance.

O Online Transaction,

M Memo Transaction,

B Batch Mode

identityType.description: (Not in use) The payer's account ID scheme.

clearingSystemId.description: (Not in use) The payer's bank clearing ID.

endToEndId.description:
The unique system reference number generated by the Bank's core banking system for a debit or credit event to the account.
Note: This identifier is only unique within the same market so it is possible to get the same identifier for different markets.

txId.description: (Not in use) The system transaction ID.

clearingSystemReference.description: The Bank's internal generated reference number. For Reject/Return cases, it will be the Bank's internal generated reference number of the original payment. Currently, only HK market will return a value, if any.

identifier.description:
The unique system reference number generated by the Bank's core banking system for a debit or credit event to the account.

Note: This identifier is only unique within the same market so it is possible to get the same identifier for different markets.

relatedRefNo.description: The related reference number from SWIFT for a credit event (only applicable for AE).

reportName.description: Name of the Report - QLDS0010R, E140, E139, MT940A, MT942

product.description: Product Category such as Account, Collections, Payments

type.description: Report Type - DDA, DDI, Payment Status, Statement

reportName.description: Name of the Report - QLDS0010R, E140, E139, MT940A, MT942

groupId.description: Your registered group ID with the Bank.

endToEndId.description: Your reference ID/end-to-end ID of the payment initiation request.

clientIdentifier.description: Your reference ID provided in the payment initiation request.

paymentContainerId.description: An internal reference ID assigned by the API banking channel.

statusString.description:
The description of the status code.
Possible values: Pending, Processed, Completed, Rejected, Returned, Stopped

statusCode.description: The payment status code assigned by the Bank.

lastAssignee.description:
The last assigned interface application of the payment.
Possible values: API, CCSAgent, SCPay

reasonCode.description: The reason code assigned by the Bank.

reasonIsoCode.description: (Not in use) The reason ISO code in case of rejection.

additionalInformation.description: The additional information of the payment updated by the product processing system if available.

timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp of the status record creation time.

originalTransactionId.description: Your reference ID provided in the payment initiation request.

clearingSystemReference.description: The clearing reference number assigned by the product processing system if available.

limitBreachIndicator.description: (Not in use) The limit breach indicator.

reasonInformation.description: The payment status information assigned by the Bank.

instructionIdentifier.description: The unique end-to-end transaction reference (UETR) which is automatically assigned by the Bank during payment initiation.

referenceId.description: Your reference ID provided in the payment initiation request.

paymentType.description: The payment type of the transaction.

requiredExecutionDate.description: The execution date of the payment.

debtorAccountCurrency.description: The ISO 3-character currency code of the debtor account currency.

customerFxRate.description: (Not in use) The customer FX Rate.

valueDate.description: The value date (processing date) of the payment.

debitDate.description: The debit date of the payment.

paymentContainerId.description: Unique reference assigned by the bank

statusString.description: Status Description of the DDI. Expected values are Pending, Rejected, Completed

statusCode.description: Status code assigned by the bank.

referenceId.description: Your company reference generated in reference field of DDI initation to be mapped here.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the response generation time. Time zone is in UTC.

reasonInformation.description: Status Description if Status is Completed or Pending, Rejection Description if Status is Rejected. Reason description is updated by the interface application.

groupId.description: Your Registered Group ID to be mapped here

referenceId.description: Unique Reference ID specified in DDA Request

statusCode.description: Back office code to classify the nature of the transaction.

statusMessage.description: Status Description. Usually for completed status code (M08), this field will be empty and for Rejected and Pending, it contains valid description.

timestamp.description: Indicate the date and time of the status change. Use for reconciliation. Time zone is in UTC.

comments.description: Additional Information. First Place holder - Provides the status of the Mandate - R -> Rejected, A -> Active. Second Place holder - Mandate Action - S -> Creation, D -> Cancellation. Third Place holder - Mandate ID. Fourth Place holder - Mandate Request ID

OpenApiPostalAddress.description: (Not in use) The creditor's address information.

id.description: Topic(channel) ID associated with the flash within the product

text.description: Topic(channel) name associated with the flash within the product

base64EncodedData.description: Element contains base64-encoded files, attached to the flash

text.example: Partnership Between  Bovespa and CME Group - Update, 10/02/2009

accountId.description: The account number for the credit/debit advice is generated.

code.description: Unique code of the impacted market

text.description: Text of the impact statement on the market
text.example: This information affects the data contained in the Other market where securities are traded and Market Entry Requirements sections of the Securities Market Information Service

virtualAccountNumber.description: Final Virtual Account Number - (Part A + Part B)

statusDescription.description: Status description of the VAM request

iban.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN), it is available only for the country that is enabled for IBAN
